name: 3dHist
author: AFNI Developers
description: Computes histograms using functions for generating priors

inputs.description: Dataset providing values for histogram.
inputs.name: Input dataset

inputs.description: Use sub-brick SB from the input rather than 0
inputs.name: Sub-brick number

inputs.description: Provide mask dataset to select subset of input.
inputs.name: Mask dataset

inputs.description: Specify the range of values to consider from MSET. Default is anything non-zero
inputs.name: Mask range

inputs.description: Provide cmask expression. Voxels where expression is 0 are excluded from computations.
inputs.name: Cmask expression

inputs.description: Read this previously created histogram instead of forming one from DSET.
inputs.name: Histogram file

inputs.description: Write histogram to niml file called PREF.niml.hist
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Write a histogram equalized version of the input dataset.
inputs.name: Equalized output

inputs.description: Use K bins.
inputs.name: Number of bins

inputs.description: Minimum intensity.
inputs.name: Minimum intensity

inputs.description: Maximum intensity.
inputs.name: Maximum intensity

inputs.description: Bin width.
inputs.name: Bin width

inputs.description: Do not count samples outside the user specified range.
inputs.name: Ignore out of range samples

inputs.description: Use previously created histogram to set range and binwidth parameters.
inputs.name: Range histogram file

inputs.description: Display histogram to stdout.
inputs.name: Show histogram

inputs.description: Set the value at which you want histogram values.
inputs.name: Histogram value at

inputs.description: Return the desired properties at a given value. You can select multiple properties.
inputs.name: Histogram parameters to get

inputs.description: Specify voxel volume in mm^3. To be used with upvol.
inputs.name: Voxel volume

inputs.description: Return the value where histogram property PAR is equal to PARVAL. PAR can be: cdf, rcdf, ncdf, nrcdf, upvol.
inputs.name: Value at histogram property

inputs.description: Return a concise output to simplify parsing.
inputs.name: Quiet output
